content: Just pinging on #20658, which is a new contributor PR. @Yaël Dillies, you self-assigned two weeks ago but haven't come back to it. I'm worried doing so inhibits other reviewers.
It's in my open tabs :sweat:
I sadly know of no other way to tell github "Please send me notifications on that PR"
No problem. The solution is to work out how to encourage people to not be inhibited by assignments to others, not to discourage self assignments. I just don't know how to do that. :-)

Yaël Dillies said:

I sadly know of no other way to tell github "Please send me notifications on that PR"

What sort of notifications would be helpful to you here? There is a button which precisely gives you notifications for anything that changes on that PR, in the Notifications section in the right column. But in this case, it wouldn't have notified you about anything, since no changes happened in the PR after you self-assigned it.
Which Notifications section? Right column of what? Are you assuming that #20658 already landed in my notifications inbox? It hasn't
(thanks for the notification :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:)

image.png
This Notifications - I'm certainly not assuming that it landed in your inbox!
